pull.title: build: Fix Boost.Process detection on macOS arm64
pull.body:
Could be tested as follows:
```
% brew install boost@1.76
% ./autogen.sh
% ./configure --with-boost='/opt/homebrew/opt/boost@1.76'
```

build: Fix Boost.Process detection on macOS arm64

Could be tested as follows:
```
% brew install boost@1.76
% ./autogen.sh
% ./configure --with-boost='/opt/homebrew/opt/boost@1.76'
```

events.message:
build: Fix Boost.Process detection on macOS arm64

Could be tested as follows:
```
% brew install boost@1.76
% ./autogen.sh
% ./configure --with-boost='/opt/homebrew/opt/boost@1.76'
```

events.body: Heh, I'll check this one. Any idea why it's different from x86_64?

> Heh, I'll check this one. Any idea why it's different from x86_64?

https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/437618/why-is-homebrew-installed-in-opt-homebrew-on-apple-silicon-macs
Tested ACK on 1d4157a42b77411579eb721b5c6fb533a357959d with boost 1.76 on macOS arm64. #24523 is required for boost 1.78.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24523](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24523) (build: Fix Boost.Process test for Boost 1.78 by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
~As we have boost 1.77 in our depends, I think this should be backported into 23.x before the final release.~
